mapper.select: SELECT vt.id, ai.appid, ai.app_name appName, ai.sid, ac.`name` as companyName FROM tb_voiceverify_temp vt, tb_app_info ai, tb_user_admin ua, tb_user_admin_authen_company ac WHERE vt.appid = ai.appid AND ai.sid = ua.sid AND ua.uid = ac.uid AND vt.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
